unnormalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill was crazy high this month! Like, ₹5500! Last month it was only ₹3200. I think the AC usage during this heatwave is to blame. Plus, that old fridge in the kitchen probably guzzles 200 units a month itself. Gotta check the meter readings too; could be some mistake from BSES. Anyone else facing similar issues?
normalised: Arre yaar, my electricity bill was crazy high this month! Like, rupee five thousand five hundred! Last month it was only rupee three thousand two hundred. I think the A-C usage during this heatwave is to blame. Plus, that old fridge in the kitchen probably guzzles two hundred units a month itself. Gotta check the meter readings too; could be some mistake from B-S-E-S. Anyone else facing similar issues?
